text:
# View announcements and configure announcement notification

The **Notification center** button on the top bar will display with a badge at
the upper-right if new announcement arrives or you have at least one unread
announcement.

Click the **Notification center** button to check all the unread
announcements. You can click the link to read the announcement details. The
badge will disappear if you have read or dismissed all the unread
announcements.

To view all the announcements that you received from the system, click **See
all** on the **Notification center** pane. You can click the Filter next to
the search box to filter the announcements of specific categories.

In addition, you can choose to receive email notification to keep your tenant
owners, service admins, or other responsible informed of the updates in
specific categories.

Go to the **Announcement notification** tab and complete the settings.
